videos.title: These Mountains Cannot Be Conquered Easily
videos.abstract: Join three seasoned adventurers as they climb and ski several peaks in Grand Teton National Park. The Tetons are among the most rugged mountains in the lower 48. videos.title: The Impossible Climb: Chris Sharma
videos.abstract: Chris Sharma is one of the world’s strongest climbers. Here he tackles the hardest climb ever achieved—a 200-foot overhanging cave at the top of a mountain in southern California. He trains for the climb in Spain with his girlfriend, Daila.
